seg-source.mrk: Cursors user defined functions Reference

target.mrk: Cursors user defined functions Reference

trans-unit.source: Below is a complete list of the user defined functions available in AutoIt. Click on a user defined function name for a detailed description.

seg-source.mrk: Below is a complete list of the user defined functions available in AutoIt.
Click on a user defined function name for a detailed description.

target.mrk: Below is a complete list of the user defined functions available in AutoIt.
Click on a user defined function name for a detailed description.

trans-unit.source: When using them you need to add a #include .

seg-source.mrk: _WinAPI_ClipCursor

target.mrk: _WinAPI_ClipCursor

trans-unit.source: Confines the cursor to a rectangular area on the screen

target.mrk: Confines the cursor to a rectangular area on the screen

seg-source.mrk: _WinAPI_CopyCursor

target.mrk: _WinAPI_CopyCursor

trans-unit.source: Creates a duplicate of a specified cursor

target.mrk: Creates a duplicate of a specified cursor

seg-source.mrk: _WinAPI_DestroyCursor

target.mrk: _WinAPI_DestroyCursor

trans-unit.source: Destroys a cursor and frees any memory the cursor occupied

seg-source.mrk: _WinAPI_GetClipCursor

target.mrk: _WinAPI_GetClipCursor

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the screen coordinates of the rectangular area to which the cursor is confined
